title.en: A Prayer to Recognize My Own Faults and Keep in Mind the Objects of Refuge

text.en: I pay homage to the guru!
Śākyamuni, Victorious One, Supreme Guide of the realm for this fortunate aeon,
text.en-trans: kalzang zhing gi dren chok shakyé gyal

text.en: Sons of the Victorious one, assembly of noble bodhisattvas who tame sentient beings,
text.en-trans: gyalsé changsem drodul pakpé tsok

text.en: Lord guru, matchless saviour of beings in the dark age,
text.en-trans: nyik drö kyobpa tsungmé guru jé

text.en: The three roots and oath-bound dharma guardians—
text.en-trans: tsa sum chökyong damchen tsok ché la

text.en: Again and again, I ask from my heart, recalling you with longing and one-pointed mind—
text.en-trans: tsechik nying né drenpé dung yü kyi

text.en: Please turn your attention toward me.
text.en-trans: yangyang soldeb tukdam kul lak na

text.en: Take hold of me with your loving-kindness and with the power of your unhindered compassion
text.en-trans: tsewé jezung tokmé tukjé tü

text.en: Grant your blessings that my thoughts and aims be carried out in accord with Dharma.
text.en-trans: samdön chö zhin drubpar jingyi lob

text.en: Through past acts, not without merit, I have obtained this precious human birth.
text.en-trans: ngön lé ma zhen milü rinchen tob

text.en: Through past merit, not slight, I have met the sublime Dharma.
text.en-trans: sönam ma chung dampé chö dang jal

text.en: Accepted by the guru, I was able to obtain empowerments, blessings, and the essential instructions—
text.en-trans: lamé jezung wang jin damngak tob

text.en: All this wealth I now hold in my hands.
text.en-trans: norbu rang lak nyepé dü jung yang

text.en: But my mind, like a babbling monkey, falls under the sway
text.en-trans: chol chung pé'u drawé rangsem di

text.en: Of the enticing, deceptive demon of distraction
text.en-trans: namyeng lu dri gongpö wang song né

text.en: And I can not take advantage of the wealth that is my own.
text.en-trans: rang nor rang dak nyamlen manü té

text.en: Thus, this free, well-favoured human birth and the lama’s teaching are both wasted.
text.en-trans: daljor damngak chab chik chüzö shor

text.en: Now I am at a turning point:
text.en-trans: danta dön chen gak la tuk nyé dü

text.en: All the teachings that I have asked for, all I have received, are like a myth.
text.en-trans: zhü tsé tob tsé nawö drung tam dra

text.en: My body has the appearance of a practitioner, and I have a practitioner’s conceit;
text.en-trans: lü di chö zuk chöpa yin lom yang

text.en: My mind can not fathom the true teachings.
text.en-trans: sem di yangdak chöpé jema zin

text.en: Lacking even a trace of common Dharma, much less holy Dharma,
text.en-trans: lha chö tachi mi chö dri ma gö

text.en: The sixteen rules for ordinary social behaviour are just something that I have heard of.
text.en-trans: mi chö tsangma chudruk goyul tsam

text.en: Seeing myself behave badly, I am without shame; seen by others, I am unembarrassed;
text.en-trans: rang tö chö ngen ché la ngotsa dral

text.en: My bond to the teachings is short as a marmot’s tail.
text.en-trans: zhen tö trel zhung chi tak drawé juk

text.en: Unable to practice properly true Dharma’s ten virtuous deeds,
text.en-trans: lha chö gé chu yangdak ngo ma tok

text.en: Harbouring sectarian bias toward the one Buddha’s teachings,
text.en-trans: tönpa chik gi ten la chok zhen gyi

text.en: I slander the teachings and great beings and gather up bad karma.
text.en-trans: chö dang dampar kurdeb lé ngen sak

text.en: Based on Dharma I carry a great weight of evil deeds.
text.en-trans: chö la ten né dikpé khur chen khyer

text.en: The more teaching I’ve received, the more my vision of myself inflates,
text.en-trans: töpa ché zhin rangtong ngagyal ché

text.en: Though intellectual analyses can not penetrate the deep meaning of the teachings.
text.en-trans: sampé ché döngowé ting ma pok

text.en: With conceit, I think, “I keep thepratimokṣadisciplines!”
text.en-trans: sotar tsultrim sungwar lom na yang

text.en: But the four virtuous dharma practices1have been lost without a trace.
text.en-trans: gejong chö zhi garsong chamé tor

text.en: With conceit, I think, “I posses the precious bodhisattva training!”
text.en-trans: changsem lab norden par lom na yang

text.en: But the four immeasurables are just like pictures of a lamp.
text.en-trans: tsemé nam zhi rimö marmé dra

text.en: With conceit, I think, “I keep the secret mantrayāna samayas!”
text.en-trans: sang ngak damtsik sungwar lom na yang

text.en: But, not respecting the first root transgression, I become careless about all the rest.
text.en-trans: tsa tung dangpor tsimé nang chung shor

text.en: I can glibly explain the four thoughts that turn the mind to Dharma,
text.en-trans: lo dok nam zhi kha né shé shé kyang

text.en: But my attachment to phenomena shows that my own mind has not truly changed.
text.en-trans: dön la dok min dir nang zhenpé tön

text.en: Though I rely on a teacher, respect and devotion slowly ebb away;
text.en-trans: lama ten zhin mögü rimgyi dri

text.en: Instead of having pure perception, I have wrong views, and see the guru as my equal.
text.en-trans: daknang tsab su nyam drok lokpar tong

text.en: Love and respect toward my vajra-friends weakens;
text.en-trans: dorjé pün la tsedung kur sem zhen

text.en: Unable to endure a few harsh words, I complain constantly.
text.en-trans: tsik ngen tsam yang mizé mö charbeb

text.en: Lacking thorough training in bodhicitta,
text.en-trans: dro druk pamar shepé jam nyingjé

text.en: The love and compassion that comes about from seeing all beings of the six realms as my parents disappears like mist.
text.en-trans: changsem tingné ma jong nabün zhin

text.en: Although I act as if I practice the paths of generation and completion,
text.en-trans: kyedzok lam la nyamlen jé khul kyang

text.en: I cannot even cope with ordinary endless delusion.
text.en-trans: tamal trul jam di la lak ma nyé

text.en: I recognize that the ultimate teaching of sūtra and tantra is emptiness,
text.en-trans: do ngak chö puk tongnyi ngoshé kyang

text.en: But cannot make use of that recognition; my mind-stream stays hard as horn.
text.en-trans: tong go ma chö ranggyü ra tar gyong

text.en: When I practice remaining in mind’s true condition
text.en-trans: neluk gom gyi rang tsuk mazinpar

text.en: I am without stability, yet I mouth off about the profound view and toss cause and effect to the winds.
text.en-trans: khakhyer tawé gyundré lung la kur

text.en: On the outside—I can give a show of good behaviour;
text.en-trans: chitar tsul chö chölam zang na yang

text.en: On the inside—desire, attachment, greed rage like fire.
text.en-trans: nang du chak sé dö ngam mé tar bar

text.en: Though my body remains in isolated mountain retreat,
text.en-trans: lü di wenpé ri la né khul kyang

text.en: My mind wanders into town constantly, night and day.
text.en-trans: sem di nyintsen barmé drong yul drim

text.en: Without enjoying a real measure of certainty in myself,
text.en-trans: rang go tönpé ding tsema long zhin

text.en: Thinking to act for others’ benefit is just a fairytale.
text.en-trans: zhen go dönpé samjor jipé drung

text.en: Although it is impossible that the Three Jewels betray me,
text.en-trans: könchok tukjé lu mi si kyang

text.en: Due to my weak devotion, I fear I will betray myself.
text.en-trans: mögü zhenpé rang gi rang lü dok

text.en: Thus, although I am without the wrong view
text.en-trans: ditar dampé chö dang lama la

text.en: Of not believing in the guru and the sacred dharma,
text.en-trans: yi machepé lokta mé mö kyang

text.en: In these bad times we sentient beings are busily perfecting our bad karma,
text.en-trans: dü ngen semchen lé ngen kha ma gang

text.en: Knowing, heedlessly, falling under the sway of unawareness;
text.en-trans: go zhin shezhin bakmé wang du shor

text.en: Failing to maintain mindfulness, we suffer a great loss.
text.en-trans: dren sheja rama tong gyong chen dab

text.en: Right now, when I examine myself, I see
text.en-trans: danta rang lö rang la ché nyinmo

text.en: That everything I have done has only added on to my confusion,
text.en-trans: jé tsé tamché trulpé kha nön song

text.en: That all my thinking has been stained by the obscuring emotions and by grasping.
text.en-trans: sam tsé tamché nyönmong dzinpar song

text.en: Not seeing that even my virtuous acts are polluted with negativities
text.en-trans: gewa ang dikpé ma lemé tongwé

text.en: Where else is there to end up but in the lower realms?
text.en-trans: tartuk drosa ngensong lé zhen chi

text.en: As for the way I behave and what I’ve done,
text.en-trans: detar rang gi chö tsulja zhak nam

text.en: Bringing these to mind, I am sickened.
text.en-trans: dren né rang gi rang la yiché ching

text.en: Looking to others, I am only more discouraged;
text.en-trans: zhen la té kyang yimuk kha nön lé

text.en: There are no friends to benefit and ease my mind.
text.en-trans: pen drok lo bak pab khen su ma jung

text.en: If I can not take care of myself now,
text.en-trans: dani rang go rang gi ma tön na

text.en: Others can not give me refuge when hope is exhausted
text.en-trans: shinjé ponyé lak tu tsü zin dü

text.en: And I am in the hands of the messengers of the Lord of Death.
text.en-trans: zhenpa sü kyang kyobpé rewa zé

text.en: To wait for a rescue that can never come, is not that self-deception?
text.en-trans: ré tong gukpé lüpa ma tsor ram

text.en: Thus, with shame and remorse recognizing my own errors,
text.en-trans: dena rang kyön ngö zin nonggyö kyi

text.en: Whatever offences against Dharma have occurred, whatever samaya transgressions and violations,
text.en-trans: chö gal nyetung nyamchak chichi pa

text.en: I will not try to conceal from those with wisdom vision.
text.en-trans: mi chab mi bé yeshe chenden drung

text.en: From the bottom of my heart, I confess; with your compassion, please endure me.
text.en-trans: nying né shak so tsewé zö zhé la

text.en: Be my refuge from the danger of the precipitous, errant path;
text.en-trans: lam lok yangsé jik lé kyab né kyang

text.en: Grant the deliverance of finding the perfect, liberating path.
text.en-trans: yangdak tarlam zinpar ukyung sol

text.en: My whole life has been spent practicing this and practicing that
text.en-trans: jé jé drub drub mitsé kyal na yang

text.en: With nothing in my hands to show for it, no attainment.
text.en-trans: dönnying lak tu lönpa chik ma jung

text.en: From now on, avoiding the miserable path of knowing much,
text.en-trans: dani kün shé chik duk lamwor né

text.en: And missing the one thing I need why not go on the path of knowing the one thing that frees all?
text.en-trans: chik shé kün drollam la chi mi juk

text.en: Certain, unfailing hope, sole, supreme Lord upon whom I rely,
text.en-trans: mi lu ngepé ré tö chikchok gön

text.en: Root guru who combines all refuges in one,
text.en-trans: tsawé lama kyabné kündü la

text.en: I supplicate you with devotion and one-pointed mind;
text.en-trans: tsechik güpé solwa deb lak na

text.en: Supreme refuge, lord of greatest kindness, take hold of me with your compassion.
text.en-trans: tukjé zik shik kyab chok drinchen jé

text.en: Grant your blessing that I be able to see my own faults.
text.en-trans: rang kyön rang gi tongwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I have no wish to see the faults of others.
text.en-trans: zhen kyön ta dö mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing evil, cruel, and vicious thoughts be pacified.
text.en-trans: sam ngen duktsub zhiwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing wholesome thoughts arise deep from within.
text.en-trans: sam zang khong né charwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing desire may lessen and contentment increase.
text.en-trans: dö chung chok shé denpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I remember the uncertainty of the time of death.
text.en-trans: namchi chamé drenpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I be unconcerned at the time of death.
text.en-trans: chi dü lo lhakmé par jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I develop trust in Dharma.
text.en-trans: chö la yiché kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I practice impartial pure perception.
text.en-trans: daknang chokmé jongpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I develop unfabricated devotion and respect.
text.en-trans: chömin mögü kyewar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I persevere, seeing that I have so little time left.
text.en-trans: longmé lona tungwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I be able to establish Dharma as my ultimate innermost goal.
text.en-trans: lo puk chö la té nü jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I persevere in practice, the ultimate goal of the Dharma.
text.en-trans: chö puk drub la tsön nü jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I free my mind-stream the innermost practice.
text.en-trans: drub puk ranggyü drolwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I have no obstacles to practice
text.en-trans: drub la barché mepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing the fruit of my practice may ripen quickly.
text.en-trans: drub dré nyurdu minpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing all conduct with those with whom I have a karmic link may be meaningful.
text.en-trans: dreltsé dön dang denpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing the duality of hope and fear be extinguished.
text.en-trans: redok nyidzin zhikpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I see non-dual wakefulness.
text.en-trans: nyimé yeshe tongwar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I recognize my own innate wakefulness.
text.en-trans: yeshe rang ngoshepar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I hold the dharmakāya citadel.
text.en-trans: rang tok tsensa zinpar jingyi lob

text.en: Grant your blessing I gain the great effortless certainty.
text.en-trans: tsolmé ding chen tobpar jingyi lob

text.en: By means of the great weapon,Indestructible primordial wakeful awareness,
text.en-trans: yé né yeshe dorjé tsön chen gyi

text.en: May the void life-force of saṃsāra and nirvāṇa both be severed, at once.
text.en-trans: khordé tong sok dü chik ché né kyang

text.en: Then, in the unending great bliss of Vajragarvā’s2feast
text.en-trans: ma gak dechen nyemmé gatön la

text.en: May we always enjoy the activity that is beyond joining and parting.
text.en-trans: dudral mepar chöpé tak tsen shok

text.en: In the pervasive space of evenness, even the word “suffering” does not exist—
text.en-trans: nyam dal long na dukngal ming tsammé

text.en: So who ought to be striving for happiness?
text.en-trans: dena dewa tsol khen su zhik chi

text.en: In the kingdom of Samantabhadra happiness and suffering are of one taste; without grasping, they liberate of themselves.
text.en-trans: deduk ronyam dzinmé rangdrol gyi

text.en: May I attain Samantabhadra’s kingdom in this very life!
text.en-trans: kunzang gyalsi tsé dir tobpar shok
